articles.title: Hulu is choking for many iOS and Apple TV users - Engadget
articles.description: Hulu users, primarily on Apple devices, are experiencing frequent app crashes and streaming problems.
articles.content: It might not be a great moment to be a Hulu fan — depending on the platform you use, at least. Users on Down Detector, Reddit and elsewhere are reporting problems with the service, many of them on Apple devices like iPhones, iPads and Apple TV. Many report th… [+499 chars]

articles.title: ‘Evil GIF’ account takeover flaw patched in Teams - Naked Security
articles.description: Microsoft has fixed a flaw in Teams that could have allowed attackers to launch a wormlike attack on multiple accounts by sending one victim a malicious GIF image.
articles.content:
Microsoft has quickly fixed a flaw in its Teams videoconferencing and collaboration program that could have allowed attackers to launch a wormlike attack on multiple accounts by sending one victim a malicious GIF image.

articles.description: Get ready for that squiggly line, two-spacers

One-spacers, rejoice.
